content.raw:
Nice, the tube model is illuminated even without any ambient light or any other light sources:

![randy_light.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/zq9ear/images/950624073-randy_light.png)

It looks like the emissive material is not illuminating surrounding models though. I just wanted to check if this is the intention. Unity [for example](https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/StandardShaderMaterialParameterEmission.html) has the option for emissive materials to add to global illumination.
